Text:
The Keygen is in Start/All Programs/Boulder Dash - Rockford Returns - Episode 4 or C:/Program Files/Foxy Games/Boulder Dash - Rockford Returns - Episode 4/keygen.exe

Run the Keygen, select what episode you need to register and click on generate button. Copy that code and go to register section inside the game and paste it.

Have Fun!

I LOVE YOU redfoxygames

Big Thanks sir

congratz on yur green skull !!!!
